query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `camera_configs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `camera_type` enum('avi', 'aoi', 'ip_camera', 'usb_camera', 'rtsp', 'http_stream') NOT NULL,
  `connection_url` varchar(1000) NOT NULL,
  `username` varchar(100),
  `password` varchar(255),
  `api_key` varchar(255),
  `analysis_type` enum('defect_detection', 'quality_inspection', 'measurement', 'ocr', 'custom') DEFAULT 'quality_inspection',
  `analysis_model_id` int,
  `analysis_config` json,
  `production_line_id` int,
  `workstation_id` int,
  `machine_id` int,
  `alert_enabled` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `alert_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 0.80,
  `alert_emails` text,
  `status` enum('active', 'inactive', 'error', 'disconnected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'inactive',
  `last_connected_at` timestamp,
  `last_error_message` text,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_camera_configs_type` (`camera_type`),
  KEY `idx_camera_configs_status` (`status`),
  KEY `idx_camera_configs_line` (`production_line_id`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `camera_configs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,

  `api_key` varchar(255),
  `analysis_type` enum('defect_detection', 'quality_inspection', 'measurement', 'ocr', 'custom') DEFAULT 'quality_inspection',
  `analysis_model_id` int,
  `analysis_config` json,
  `production_line_id` int,
  `workstation_id` int,
  `machine_id` int,
  `alert_enabled` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `alert_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 0.80,
  `alert_emails` text,
  `status` enum('active', 'inactive', 'error', 'disconnected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'inactive',
  `last_connected_at` timestamp,
  `last_error_message` text,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_camera_configs_type` (`camera_type`),
  KEY `idx_camera_configs_status` (`status`),
  KEY `idx_camera_configs_line` (`production_line_id`)
);
